item.description:
Totally up for Dancing Tonight!!! Old school "Vintage" Rock/Funk/Soul

Come join me at Bull McCabe's to see "The Cool Rays" I saw this band play at the Asgard this summer and they were terrific. If you like down on bended knee, electric guitar playing and the showman ship of the funky soul bands of 1960s, Reggae from the 70s ...this is the one baby!!


Prince (Kiss)
BB King ( The Thrill is Gone)
Sam and Dave (Song from Blues Brothers Movie: I'm a Soul Man)
Wilson Picket
Toots
Bob Marley

PARKING: WARNING!!! DO NOT PARK IN THE LOT NEXT TO THE BUILDING! Park in the street in front on Somerville Ave.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing my hippie tie dye shirt with long sleeves
item.name: Live Band Free Dance Party @ Bull McCabe's (Somerville)
